modName: Skyrim Helmet Main Menu Replacer - DELETED
summary: Replaces the main menu with a high quality picture displaying an iron helmet entrenched in snow
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]As if we needed another one of these...

This is just a simple replacer for the main menu, nothing extravagant or silly, but what I believe to look best for a game's menu. If you encounter any issues, let me know.




Picture pulled from here:Â https://imgur.com/gallery/u9NqjS6

Should the poster, or original creator request I remove this (as this is not my work), I will happily oblige.[/font]
author: justabunchorandomnumber
